name: 77 Days
description:
Spend your days exploring and your nights travelling. By journeying the land and managing your resources well, you can ready yourself for the coming threat.

Game time is about 10-15 minutes. There are two ways to win.

Tips

Left click a usable item to use it.
Right click an item to discard it. If you right click an item while the market is open and you have a vending licence, you will sell it instead.
Hold ctrl while clicking to buy/sell/discard 10 at a time.

Art from Kenney's 1-Bit Pack

Source Code
